p: Neither colostrum nor milk composition were affected ( p ≥ 0.10) by dietary treatment, and there were no dam parity x diet interactive effects ( p ≥ 0.10; Table 5). Colostrum from primiparous sows tended to have a higher ( p = 0.071) concentration of IgG and had higher fat ( p = 0.007) and NE ( p = 0.012) concentrations than colostrum from multiparous sows ( Table 5), but there were no differences ( p ≥ 0.10) in milk. There were no other differences between primiparous and multiparous sows in any other colostrum or milk composition parameters measured ( Table 5).
